video_prompt: Elevated vehicle with glowing windows streams across a neon-lit cityscape. Cars streak by, their lights blurring. Billboards flicker with changing ads. Pedestrians move on balconies and walkways. String lights sway. Distant city glows softly.
image_prompt: Vibrant, futuristic cyberpunk cityscape at night, looking down a long, wide street flanked by tall buildings with illuminated billboards and East Asian characters. A massive, dark elevated train/flying vehicle with glowing red/orange lights dominates the upper frame. Bustling street level with cars and light streaks. Multi-layered urban environment with elevated walkways. Prominent reds, oranges, and blues against dark grey and black architecture, creating a dynamic atmosphere with a soft ethereal glow in the distance.
refined_video_prompt: An elevated vehicle glides across a neon-drenched city, its windows reflecting dynamic light. Ground-level traffic streaks past, lights blurring into trails. Digital billboards intensely flicker with rapidly changing advertisements. Pedestrians move fluidly across elevated walkways and balconies. Overhead string lights gently sway. The distant city subtly twinkles and shifts with urban light.
